data: PED/NEO TM Factor Replacement Other (Factor VII /  Factor XI / Factor XIII) (Module)
Orders expire 5 days from order date and time
Products expire 3 hours from reconstitution. Confirm dose times with TM. Product will not be reconstituted until patient is ready for transfusion
Requires approval from Health Canada Special Access Program. Contact TMS and Bleeding Disorder Program before ordering
Routine, IU, IV direct, Administer over: 3 - 5 Minutes (IV Direct), q4h interval, T;N
Routine, IU, IV direct, Administer over: 3 - 5 Minutes (IV Direct), q6h interval, T;N

Routine, IU, IV direct, Administer over: 3 - 5 Minutes (IV Direct), q48h, T;N
Requires approval from Health Canada Special Access Program. Contact TMS and Bleeding Disorder Program before ordering
